TaskDescription.Detail: Capture and save the web page screen and check the captured content by running the file.

Assist.value: Launch the Chrome browser and go to the amazon page.
Enter the variable 'this.browser' to store the executed browser information.
Enter the site 'https://www.amazon.com' where you want to take a screen capture.
Captures the screen of the current page and saves it as a file.
Enter the variable 'this.screenshotFile' to store the path containing the file name where the screenshot is saved.
Enter the variable 'Global.ProjectDir' that means the project path as the path to the file to save the screenshot.
Displays the path where the file is saved for checking the file where the screenshot is saved.
Enter the variable 'this.screenshotFile' where the file path to display is stored.
